text: Portola Valley is an incorporated town in San Mateo County, California, United States. It was founded in 1964. In 2016, it was the richest town in America per the American Community Survey. Home prices are also among the highest in the nation. The average income per household in Portola Valley is $435,371, and the median income is $250,001. The 2020 United States Census reported that Portola Valley had a population of 4,456. ==References== Category:Towns in California Category:Settlements in San Mateo County, California Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area
title: Portola Valley, California
